alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walker, southeastern Marion and Winston Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Town Creek to 7 miles west of Weston. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Haleyville, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Arley, Double Springs, Brilliant, Addison, Nauvoo, Curry, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Nesmith, Ashbank, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Ashridge, Brinn and Falls City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
